New Records: Lungi Ngidi took 3 wickets for 17 runs
Key Match Events: Lungi Ngidi's spell put the Proteas on path to down India
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and elected to bat
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Perth Stadium on 30 October 2022
Others: India's team: Rohit Sharma (c), KL Rahul, Virat Kohli, Suryakumar Yadav, Hardik Pandya, Deepak Hooda, Dinesh Karthik (wk), Ravichandran Ashwin, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Mohammed Shami, Arshdeep Singh
South Africa's team: Temba Bavuma (c), Quinton de Kock (wk), Rilee Rossouw, Aiden Markram, David Miller, Tristan Stubbs, Wayne Parnell, Keshav Maharaj, Kagiso Rabada, Anrich Nortje, Lungi Ngidi
